recipe.title: Cottage Pie
recipe.ingredient: 1/2 cup frozen peas defrosted or a zucchini grated
recipe.step: Heat olive oil in large fry pan and add garlic.
Once golden add mince meat and cook until brown add all other ingredients except spud.
Cook until meat no longer brown and sauce thickens.
Place cooked meat in a tray and spoon over mash spud. Smooth the spud with the back of a large spoon.
Cook for 30-40 minutes or until golden brown.
Serve with side salad or lots of tomatoe sauce!.
Boil cubed potatoes until soft (20-30min). Drain, add butter and mash. Add salt and white pepper to taste
